original_text: Then the prophet Jeremiah replied to the prophet Hananiah before the priests and all the people who were standing in the house of the Lord.
korean_text: 선지자 예레미야가 여호와의 성전에 서 있는 제사장들과 모든 백성들이 보는 앞에서 선지자 하나냐에게 말하니라

sentences.original_text: before the priests and all the people
who were standing in the house of the Lord
